thread.title_full: Wonderful Hotel and great service from Cncierge - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bhnf
title: Wonderful Hotel and great service from Cncierge
text:
We had a great weekend at the Iroquois Hotel once again and were helped tremendously by the concierge, Mr. Bill Heinrichs, after we fouled up our show tickets. He made some calls and got us in after we mistakenly bought tickets for the wrong show.
Room Tip: good place near the Broadway theaters See more room tips
